name: Asian Word Count
author: ye11ow

sections.description:
Asian Word Count is a plugin for WordPress based on WP word count which gives you word count statistics for your blog’s posts and pages. Asian Word Count supports Asian languages( Chinese, Korean, and Japanese). In addition to overall stats, Asian Word Count also gives figures and details for the largest posts and pages of your blog as well as breakdowns by author.
* Currently the the interface of the plugin is English, I’m trying to tanslate into Chinese and other languages. If you can contribute to the tranlation, send me an email to ye111111ow (at) gmail.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload asianwordcount to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Asian Word Count can be accessed under the “Dashboard” Menu of the WordPress Admin.
sections.changelog:
0.9.5

  • Add Monthly Statistics feature
  • Fix minor bugs

0.9.1

  • Add new interface language: Chinese
  • Fix minor bugs

0.9

  • Initial release
